author: Peterson, T.C., and R.S. Vose

organization.description:
Weather, temperature, carbon, water, soil and all other kinds of climate related open data.  Including (but not limited to) data about:

 * the atmosphere
 * the weather
 * air quality
 * temperature
 * the ocean
 * rivers
 * water levels
 * water quality
 * carbon emissions
 * pollution
 * soil erosion
 * biodiversity

For background information see [blog on article on IPCC data](http://blog.okfn.org/2007/11/20/the-ipcc-data-distribution-centre-environmental-data-licensing/), [the wiki](http://wiki.okfn.org/OpenEnvironmentalData), and [this other blog article](http://blog.okfn.org/2009/12/05/climate-change-climate-sceptics-and-open-data/). If you would like to help update or maintain this group, please [get in touch](http://okfn.org/contact)!

The climate data group is supported by the [Open Knowledge Foundation](http://www.okfn.org), [Clear Climate Code](http://clearclimatecode.org/) and the scientists at [Real Climate](http://www.realclimate.org/).

### Existing Lists of Climate Datasets to Migrate Here

 * <http://www.realclimate.org/index.php/data-sources/>
 * <http://ergodd.zoo.ox.ac.uk/eden/index.php?p=10>
 * <http://wiki.okfn.org/OpenEnvironmentalData/DatabaseOfEmissionsData>
 * <http://wiki.okfn.org/OpenEnvironmentalData>
organization.title: Climate Data
organization.name: climatedata

name: ghcn
notes:
### About data

Monthly climate data for thousands of worldwide weather stations.  Data are available for each station and also gridded (onto 5x5 degree cells).


> The Global Historical Climatology Network (GHCN-Monthly) data base contains historical temperature, precipitation, and pressure data for thousands of land stations worldwide. The period of record varies from station to station, with several thousand extending back to 1950 and several hundred being updated monthly via CLIMAT reports. The data are available without charge through NCDCâ€™s anonymous FTP service.

### Format

Compressed plain text, fixed width columns.

### License

From .gov site, and US government department, so one would assume a fair amount in the public domain. However, data is aggregated and includes non-US sources, so this should be clarified.
title: Global Historical Climatology Network (GHCN)
